features.name: Document Upload

features.description: Create, read, update, and delete RAG stores with metadata management

features.name: Chat Interface
features.description: Real-time chat interface with markdown rendering, source citations, and chat history

features.name: Chat API
features.description: Backend API endpoints for saving, retrieving, and deleting chat messages with pagination

features.name: Gemini API Integration

features.name: API Service

features.name: Database Schema
features.description: PostgreSQL database schema with Drizzle ORM for chats and RAG stores

features.description: Backend health check endpoint for monitoring server status

features.name: Error Handling
features.description: Comprehensive error handling with user-friendly error messages and retry options
